result.name: gis-3rd-party
result.notes: This dataset contains a list of useful links to 3rd party GIS open resources

organization.name: city-of-york-council
organization.title: City of York Council
organization.description:
Corporate Open Data platform - http://www.yorkopendata.org/

Corporate map browser - http://maps.york.gov.uk/localviewexternal/sites/lv/

result.title: GIS 3rd Party

resources.description:
Ordnance Survey's open data products. Available product examples:

•	OS Open Greenspace                                                                   
•	OS Open Map - Local                                                                   
•	OS Names API                                                                   
•	OS Open Roads                                                                   
•	OS VectorMap District                                                                   
•	OS Open Rivers                                                                   
•	OS Terrain 50                                                                   
•	1:250,000 Scale Colour Raster                                                                   
•	OS Open Names                                                                   
•	Boundary-Line                                                                   
•	Code-Point Open                                                                   
•	MiniScale                                                                   
•	GB Overview Maps                                                                   
•	Strategi                                                                   
•	OS Locator                                                                   
•	1:50,000 Scale Gazetteer
resources.name: Ordnance Survey

resources.description:
Environment Agency's open datasets in data.gov.uk. Some datasets examples:

•	LIDAR Composite Digital Surface Model (DSM)                                        
•	LIDAR Composite Digital Terrain Model (DTM)                                        
•	Historic Flood Map                                                                                
•	Flood Map for Planning (Rivers and Sea)- Flood Zone 2                         
•	Flood Map for Planning (Rivers and Sea)- Flood Zone 3                        
•	Flood Risk Areas                                                                                
•	Flood Warning Areas
resources.name: Environment Agency

resources.description:
Links to some of the Environment Agency Web Map Services [__(WMS)__](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Web_Map_Service) available. 

•	[__EA Historic Flood Map__](http://environment.data.gov.uk/ds/wms?INTERFACE=ENVIRONMENT--889885c0-d465-11e4-9507-f0def148f590)    

•	[__EA Flood Zone 3__](http://environment.data.gov.uk/ds/wms?INTERFACE=ENVIRONMENT--87446770-d465-11e4-b97a-f0def148f590)        

•	[__EA Flood Zone 2__](http://environment.data.gov.uk/ds/wms?INTERFACE=ENVIRONMENT--86ec354f-d465-11e4-b09e-f0def148f590)          

•	[__EA Flood Warning Areas__](http://environment.data.gov.uk/ds/wms?INTERFACE=ENVIRONMENT--87e5d78f-d465-11e4-9343-f0def148f590)
resources.name: Environment Agency WMS

resources.description:
British Geological Survey's open data section. Other BGS services available:

•	[__BGS Web Map Services (WMS) page__](http://www.bgs.ac.uk/data/services/wms.html)                                           
•	[__BGS Web Feature Services (WFS) page__](http://www.bgs.ac.uk/data/services/wfs.html)
resources.name: British Geological Survey

resources.description: Geographic information about the natural environment from across government. For more information on Magic please visit [What is MAGIC?]("https://magic.defra.gov.uk/About_MAGIC.htm")
resources.name: MAGIC
